summary: Extensive experience in tourism is spiced up by well-trained writing skills and unforgettable practice in event organization. Bottle this up with 3 years of work in HR for expats in the Netherlands and you get a vivid impression of my career path. Currently I am sharing my knowledge and experience with the students of International Communication Bachelor study at Hanze University of Applied Sciences. Passion in fine-tuning communication between people with different culture backgrounds brings me to success in facilitating intercultural groups. Currently my interest lies in the developments of diversity and inclusion policies and internationalisation
